snippet: John Idzik, the new general manager, will need to revamp an offense devoid of playmakers and rebuild a Jets roster.
abstract: New York Jets hire John Idzik as general manager and Marty Mornhinweg as team's offensive coordinator.
lead_paragraph: John Idzik, the new general manager, will need to revamp an offense devoid of playmakers and rebuild a Jets roster.

headline.seo: Jets Select John Idzik General Manager and Marty Mornhinweg as Offensive Coordinator
headline.main: Jets Name Leaders in Front Office and Offense
headline.print_headline: Jets Name Leaders In Front Office And Offense
